body:
For some reason, the shell support takes 1.5s to run:
```
$ time . /home/certik/repos/spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh

real    0m1.452s
user    0m1.236s
sys     0m0.160s
```
That prevents me to put it into `.bashrc`, because then every time I open a new terminal window, I have to wait 1.5s.
title: setup-env.sh takes 1.5s to run
